response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique offering is worth more than $10,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional value and exclusivity. Considering its remarkable features and benefits, I am extending this opportunity to you with an offer of $15,000. This price not only reflects the intrinsic value of the product but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a premium. I believe this investment would be highly rewarding for you. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 15000}
